*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel Parkman to Austin, Missouri, August 1, 1828. Contemplates emigrating to Texas; asks Austin many questions about the country.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Petit Saw Bluff Missouri*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="08-01-1828">August 1st 1828*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir A desire which I have for some time entertained to have a knowledge of the distinguishing characteristics of the *location_mentioned*Province of Texas*/location_mentioned* has been of late much increased by the perusal of some of your letters published in the *location_mentioned*papers of this country*/location_mentioned*. I write at this [time] to request a minut description of the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*but the more particularly of that part of the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*in which you are established I am under the impression that you have obtained of the *person_mentioned*Mexican Government*/person_mentioned* an extensive *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*which you are now Colonizing, For the sake of brevity I will condense the subjects of my enquiries into the following questions. How far is your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*from the *location_mentioned*Gulf Coast*/location_mentioned*? Is the country Mountainous or level. How Large are the*location_mentioned* Rivers Colorado*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*Brasos*/location_mentioned*? Do they in any considerable degree afford facilities for navigation? What proportion do the*location_mentioned* rich lands bear to the poor or barren lands*/location_mentioned*? I have taken the Idea that *location_mentioned*lands along the rivers*/location_mentioned* are extremely fertile but that the *location_mentioned*intermediate hills*/location_mentioned* were dry and barren. Am I right? Is it a *location_mentioned*timbered Country*/location_mentioned* What is the extent of your *location_mentioned*grant*/location_mentioned*? Is it Surveyed? Is the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* in general explored and Surveyed? What enducements can you hold out to a *person_mentioned*Surveror */person_mentioned*who is a complete master of the business in all its branches? Are you in want of a person to assist you in making your map of the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*? Are the *location_mentioned*unoccupied lands*/location_mentioned* in the hands of the general Government of *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*as in this *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*? What Route would you recommend to *person_mentioned*emigrants */person_mentioned*from the *location_mentioned*States on the Ohio River*/location_mentioned*. What time is required to Sail from your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*to the *location_mentioned*port */location_mentioned*nearest to the *location_mentioned*City of Mexico*/location_mentioned*. I have now given you some of the leading points uppon which I desire information. There may be others which may occur to you if so I shall be grateful for their insertion. I have an intention of visiting your *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*if the prospects shall appear favorable. I am a *person_mentioned*Surveyor */person_mentioned*and in that business would wish to be employed either in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*or elsewhere in the *location_mentioned*Mexican Provinces*/location_mentioned*. I am aware that the number of my enquiries may intrude uppon your leisure but you may rest assured that in giving me the desired information you will confer a verry particular favor and not only on myself but a verry considerable number of my *person_mentioned*acquaintances */person_mentioned*who have some Idea of emigrating I must request that you will answer as early as convenient*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Samuel Parkman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Con Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felippe de Austin Texas*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*P. S. If convenient I would be happy to see a small *location_mentioned*map */location_mentioned*of your *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*Direct to *location_mentioned*Petit Saw Bluff La Fayette Co Missouri*/location_mentioned* via *location_mentioned*St, Louis Missouri*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
